data.eml:eml: Contributions to the Opiinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae) of Eastern Iran with updated checklist of Iranian species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Khajeh, Nahid, Rakhshani, Ehshan, Peris-Felipo, Francisco Javier, Žikić, Vladimir (2014): Contributions to the Opiinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae) of Eastern Iran with updated checklist of Iranian species. Zootaxa 3784 (2): 131-147, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3784.2.3
